dcterms:creator: Daichi Azuma
Taiki Miyanishi
Shuhei Kurita
Motoki Kawanabe
dcterms:description: The ScanQA dataset contains 41,363 diverse question-answer pairs and 3D object localization annotations for 800 indoor 3D scenes of the ScanNet dataset. It includes two test sets with and without object annotations.
dcterms:title: ScanQA

dcterms:creator: Xiaojian Ma
Silong Yong
Zilong Zheng
Qing Li
Yitao Liang
Song-Chun Zhu
Siyuan Huang
dcterms:description: The SQA3D dataset provides around 6,800 unique situations based on 650 ScanNet scenes, accompanied by 20,400 descriptions and 33,400 diverse reasoning questions for these situations.
dcterms:title: SQA3D
